aboutpara: My name Joe i'm 30 years old, I was born in 1993,Latvia.I moved to united states to continue my education,Then i got job opportunity in the famous porn company "Brazzers" , I worked there as videographer and video editor,After 2 years i took decision to start my own projects and working as freelancer,So in the present i'm creating my own contents and sell it to to my clients,I create contents based on clients ideas,So you can come to me giving me details about what you like ,what you want to see,And i will create custom videos specially for you,My way how i work it's different  but i like satisfy my clients and made them happy.
